title: "Need Sebi-like regulatory model for artificial intelligence: Sanjiv Sanyal"
excerpt: "Stating that the model of self-regulation and bureaucratic regulation is unlikely to work in the artificial intelligence space, Sanyal suggested that India could think of having a regulator, which understands the technology and pays attention to how it is evolving."
